Title: Relates to enabling constitutionally-qualified electors to register to vote and to cast a ballot on the same day at a polling location
Summary: Enables constitutionally-qualified electors to register to vote and to cast a ballot on the same day at a polling location.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to enabling constitutionally-qualified electors to register to vote and to cast a ballot on the same day at a polling location
